leukapp.apps.participants.constants module¶

This module contains the participants app constants. Information that isn’t likely to change and that is used across the participants app and the leukapp project should be stored here.

Important

DO NOT change any constant unless you know what you are doing.

APP_NAME = 'participants'¶

Application’s name.

PARTICIPANT_CREATE_FIELDS = ('first_name', 'last_name', 'email', 'phone')¶

Fields required to create a new instance.

PARTICIPANT_CREATE_PERMISSIONS = ('participants.add_participant',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to create a new instance.

PARTICIPANT_CREATE_URL = 'participants:create'¶

Create URL reverse string.

PARTICIPANT_LIST_URL = 'participants:list'¶

List URL reverse string.

PARTICIPANT_UNIQUE_TOGETHER = ('email',)¶

Fields that are required to be unique together.

PARTICIPANT_UPDATE_FIELDS = ('first_name', 'last_name', 'phone')¶

Enabled fields to update an existing instance.

PARTICIPANT_UPDATE_PERMISSIONS = ('participants.change_participant',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to update an existing instance.

PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE = " You don't have permission to perform this action, please contact a\n Leukgen Administrator. "¶

Permission denied message.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE = 'Looking good'¶

Sucess message.
